Black Edge: Inside Information, Dirty Money, and the Quest to Bring Down the Most Wanted Man on Wall Street (Sheelah Kolhatkar)
- Your Highlight at location 726-727 | Added on Thursday, 26 July 2018 01:29:52

Cohen was a little different. He wasn’t particularly fantastic at math, he didn’t study global economies, he had no unique investing philosophy. He was just a great trader,
==========
